_source.text: 1913/1914 season was last season before World War I. Worse next season when that season competition on May 23, 1915 postponed because Italy took part in the war.

text: **1913**/**1914** season was last season before World War I. **Worse** **next** season when that season competition
on May 23, **1915** postponed **because** Italy took part in the war.
